question: Hi there,I have a chronic yeast infection that just wont go away. My doctor has given me Fluconazole ( is this the same as Diflucan?) And perscribed strong cream to use. but nothing has made a difference. I am totally STD free, and don't think i have diabetes.Can anyone offer any advice on other medications? the pain is starting to really get on top of me now
title: Persistant yeast infection
